name: Squirrel - PIXEL Challenge 2018 - Honourable Mention - Student Video Games
name_original: Squirrel - PIXEL Challenge 2018 - Honourable Mention - Student Video Games
description:
We are a team of 6 French, composed of 5 graphic designers from ESMI bordeaux, as well as a gameplay programmer from Cnam-ENJMIN.

After 48 hours of Game Jam in Quebec, at the pixel challenge, we came 2nd out of forty participants in the Student Video Games category.

The assets of the game stated by the judges were the finality of the game, the game animations, the tutorials embedded in the scene, the nervous gameplay and the feedbacks

Team:

Alexine Pineaud - Assets modeling, texturing

https://www.artstation.com/alexine_pineaud

Caroline Laterrere - Character design, 2D annimation

https://www.facebook.com/Rocartiste/

Kévin Tisaire - Integration

https://www.artstation.com/aseirti

Mathieu Desplanque - Setup, 3D animation, editing, mixing

https://www.artstation.com/mathieu_desplanque3d

Sylvain Culié - Character modeler, assets modeling, texturing

Ugo Belfiore - Project leader, Gameplay programming

http://www.belfiore.ovh/
